§ 1464. Voice of America/Europe As part of its duties and programs under this subchapter, Voice of America/Europe shall—(1) target news and features in accordance with the findings and recommendations of the Young European Survey;
(2) conduct periodic audience evaluations and measurements; and
(3) promote and advertise Voice of America/Europe.
(Jan. 27, 1948, ch. 36, title V, § 504, as added Pub. L. 100–204, title IV, § 402, Dec. 22, 1987, 101 Stat. 1381.)
